entries.text: Undead! Undead!
Keep your hands off our bell, the great Bell of Alken!
Keep your hands off our bell, the great Bell of Venn!
The bell belongs! To the Princess, it do!
The bell belongs! To the Prince, it do!
Stay back, or we slice! Slice you to bits! Me and my chums, we shan't be miffed!
Stay back, or you're pieces! Tiniest pieces! Hah hah hah hah!
A long, long, long time ago, the Princess, she made me, yes, just like so!
A long, long, long time ago, the Prince, he made me, yes, just like so!
To guard this bell! For the prince's honour!
To guard this bell! Princess's honour!
Stay away, foul Undead, or you'll be a goner! Hah hah hah hah!
Stay back! It belongs, to the Princess, it do!
Stay back! It belongs to the Prince, yes it do!
Mwah hah hah, ooh hoo hoo!
Hah hah hah, ooh hoo hoo!
You wish to guard the bell, you do?
For the Prince, and the Princess, forever, for true?
For the Princess, and Prince? Forever, for true?
Hah hah, heh! Here, for you!
When you're 'round the bell, you'll be brought near!
When the bell is in trouble, the ring brings you here!
Slice 'em to shreds, whoever they are! Wherever, whoever, be they near, be they far!
Slice 'em to pieces! For the Princess!
Slice 'em to pieces! For the Prince, yes!
Hah hah hah! Oh, ah, hoo...
Bwah hah hah hah!
Gah hah hah hah hah!
Useless fool! Filthy Undead!
Be gone, right now, or it's off with your head! Ah hah hah hah!
You want to guard the bell, do you?
For the Prince and the Princess, forever, for true?
For the Princess, and Prince, forever, for true?
Ah hah hah! The Princess made me! To guard the Bell of Alken!
The Prince made me! To guard the Bell of Venn!
In Alken! The bell! Of the princess! In Venn! The bell! Of the prince, yes!
In Venn! The bell! Of the fine prince! In Alken! The bell! Of the princess!
Tear 'em to shreds, tear 'em to bits! Gather around, and ring the bell swift!
We've been ringing this bell forever, we have! Ah hah hah hah!
Gah hah! Hah hah hah!
That's it! Bravo! Tear 'em to shreds!
Slice 'em and dice 'em, and bring me their heads! Ah hah hah!
Bravo, my friend, look how they've bled!
Keep slicin'! And dicin'! Till they're all little shreds, heh!
Hah hah, ooh hoo!
Hah! Haaaah!
You are the best! The absolute best!
Heh, hah hah hah!
Bah! I'll slice you to shreds!
The Undead is back! That silly Undead!
Aggh hah hah hah hah, dee hee, hee...
Agh hoo hoo, hah hah hah!
Ooh hoo hoo, ah hah hah!
Hah hah hah, gah hah hah, ooh...
Slice you to pieces, miniature pieces...arrgh!
Yarghh hee hee hee hee!
##Forever...for true!
Hah hah hah, ooh hoo, ohh...
Take these! Take 'em! Take 'em for you!
Hmmgg.... Mwah hah hah hah!
